body_html: Work on csv improvements is limited right now since it is usually only used for simple examples. We'd really appreciate any PR that would improve this. You could argue that this change might not be ideal, since you have a data file that doesn't match the schema you are declaring. I'd say that if you want to add this behavior, it should be optional, since another user might want to know if the schema of the csv matches exactly. For example, somebody might have inserted a new column, and it is good to know that the sizes don't match so you can check that.

body: Work on csv improvements is limited right now since it is usually only used for simple examples. We'd really appreciate any PR that would improve this. You could argue that this change might not be ideal, since you have a data file that doesn't match the schema you are declaring. I'd say that if you want to add this behavior, it should be optional, since another user might want to know if the schema of the csv matches exactly. For example, somebody might have inserted a new column, and it is good to know that the sizes don't match so you can check that.
